name: CIMILaboratoryResults
title: CIMI Base Laboratory Class FHIR Profiles
publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Information Modeling Initiative

contact.name: HL7 International - Clinical Information Modeling Initiative

description: This implementation guide defines and describes the FHIR profiles for general types of laboratory test results, quantitative, ordinal, coded, narrative, titer (ratio), and documented results.
copyright: Graphite Health, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

resource.name: Standard Laboratory Observation Base profile
resource.description: An abstract base profile on which other sub-types will be built.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Coded
resource.description: The base profile for all lab tests with coded results (excluding ordinal).

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Document
resource.description: A base profile for all LOINC lab tests that have an attached document or structured text as the result.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Narrative
resource.description: The base profile for all LOINC lab tests that have textual results in a string format.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Ordinal
resource.description: The base profile for all LOINC lab tests that have ordinal results.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Quantitative
resource.description: An abstract laboratory observation profile for quantitative types of lab tests.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Titer
resource.description: The base profile for all LOINC lab tests that have titer results.

resource.name: Reference Range Nominal
resource.description: This is an extension for the Reference Range element in Observation and is used to capture coded types of reference ranges.

resource.name: Abnormal Interpretation Numeric Nominal value set
resource.description: A set of Snomed CT terms that describe the abnormality of numeric laboratory tests, when applicable.

resource.name: Abnmormal Interpretation value set
resource.description: A set of Snomed CT codes that describe the abnormality of a lab test result.

resource.name: LOINC Document class value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that are used for lab tests that are reported using attachments (documents, reports, etc.)

resource.name: Lab Result Code value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that describe laboratory tests.

resource.name: Null Flavor value set
resource.description: A set of Snomed CT codes that describe when a test result would not have a value.

resource.name: Ordinal Value Code value set
resource.description: A set of Snomed CT codes that are used to describe lab test results that are of an ordinal nature.

resource.name: Reference Range Nominal value set
resource.description: A set of Snomed CT terms that describe reference ranges.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Narrative value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that are used for lab tests with tex-based results.

resource.name: Standard Coded Lab Observation Code value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that describe lab tests that are nominal.

resource.name: Standard Coded Lab Observation Code value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that describe lab tests that are nominal.

resource.name: Standard Lab Obs Quantitative Code value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes that are used to identify quantitative types of lab tests.

resource.name: Titer Lab Codes value set
resource.description: A set of LOINC codes used to identify titer laboratory tests.

resource.name: Units of Measure value set
resource.description: A set of codes from the UCUM codes system.

resource.name: CodedLab-example
resource.description: An example of a coded lab test.

resource.name: DocumentLab-example
resource.description: An example of a lab test where the rsults are reported using a document.

resource.name: NarrativeLab-example
resource.description: An example of a narrative lab test.

resource.name: OrdinalLab-example
resource.description: An example of an ordinal lab test.

resource.name: QuantitativeLab-example
resource.description: An example of a quantitative lab test.

resource.name: TiterLab-example
resource.description: An example of a titer lab test.
